TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TemplateVisualStateAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class TemplateVisualStateAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class TemplateVisualStateAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定控件可处于特定状态，并且 应该位于该控件的 中。

span.span: Specifies that a control can be in a certain state and that a is expected in the control's .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件作者使用此属性指定属于其控件 的 和 对象。Control authors use this attribute to specify the and objects that belong in their control's . 例如，假设您创建了一个新控件，该控件具有两个名为 `Focused` 和 `Unfocused`的可视状态，这两个状态都位于名为 `FocusStates`的 中。For example, suppose that you create a new control that has two visual states named `Focused` and `Unfocused`, both of which are in a named `FocusStates`. 若要指定 作者可以使用这些可视状态，请将两个 特性添加到控件的类签名。To specify to authors that they can use those visual states, add two attributes to the class signature of the control. 指定 属性 `FocusStates` 并且 属性 `Focused` 为一个属性，并 `Unfocused` 另一个。Specify that the property is `FocusStates` and that the property is `Focused` for one and `Unfocused` for the other. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `NumericUpDown` 控件的类签名。The following example shows the class signature for the `NumericUpDown` control. 此示例指定 `NumericUpDown` 控件使用四种可视状态。This example specifies that the `NumericUpDown` control uses four visual states. 名为 `Positive` 和 `Negative`的两个状态在名为 `ValueStates`的 中。Two states, named `Positive` and `Negative`, are in the named `ValueStates`. 其他两个状态，名称 `Focused` 和 `Unfocused`都位于名为 `FocusedStates`的 中。The other two states, name `Focused` and `Unfocused`, are in the named `FocusedStates`. 有关完整示例，请参阅[创建具有可自定义外观的控件](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance)。For the entire example, see [Creating a Control That Has a Customizable Appearance](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance). [!code-csharp[VSMCustomControl#ClassAttributes](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmcustomcontrol/csharp/numericupdown.cs#classattributes)] [!code-vb[VSMCustomControl#ClassAttributes](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmcustomcontrol/visualbasic/numericupdown.vb#classattributes)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性对应于 对象的 属性。The property corresponds to the property of a object. 若要指定 所属 ，请设置 属性。To specify what a belongs in, set the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `NumericUpDown` 控件的类签名。The following example shows the class signature for the `NumericUpDown` control. 此示例指定 `NumericUpDown` 控件使用四种可视状态。This example specifies that the `NumericUpDown` control uses four visual states. 名为 `Positive` 和 `Negative`的两个状态在名为 `ValueStates`的 中。Two states, named `Positive` and `Negative`, are in the named `ValueStates`. 其他两个状态，名称 `Focused` 和 `Unfocused`都位于名为 `FocusedStates`的 中。The other two states, name `Focused` and `Unfocused`, are in the named `FocusedStates`. 有关完整示例，请参阅[创建具有可自定义外观的控件](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance)。For the entire example, see [Creating a Control That Has a Customizable Appearance](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性对应于 的 属性。The property corresponds to the property of a . 若要指定 属于控件的 ，请设置 属性。To specify what belongs in a control's , set the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `NumericUpDown` 控件的类签名。The following example shows the class signature for the `NumericUpDown` control. 此示例指定 `NumericUpDown` 控件使用四种可视状态。This example specifies that the `NumericUpDown` control uses four visual states. 名为 `Positive` 和 `Negative`的两个状态在名为 `ValueStates`的 中。Two states, named `Positive` and `Negative`, are in the named `ValueStates`. 其他两个状态，名称 `Focused` 和 `Unfocused`都位于名为 `FocusedStates`的 中。The other two states, name `Focused` and `Unfocused`, are in the named `FocusedStates`. 有关完整示例，请参阅[创建具有可自定义外观的控件](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance)。For the entire example, see [Creating a Control That Has a Customizable Appearance](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance).
